Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Anonymous \A*non"y*mous\, a. [Gr. ? without name; 'an priv. + ?, Eol. for ? name. See {Name}.] Nameless; of unknown name; also, of unknown or unavowed authorship; as, an anonymous benefactor; an anonymous pamphlet or letter. [1913 Webster]

anonymous adj 1: having no known name or identity or known source; "anonymous authors"; "anonymous donors"; "an anonymous gift" [syn: {anon.}] [ant: {onymous}] 2: not known or lacking marked individuality; "brown anonymous houses"; "anonymous bureaucrats in the Civil Service"
